### R code for Figures in Mogil et al. "Genetic architecture of gene expression traits across diverse populations" <https://doi.org/10.1101/245761>
- Final Formatting for PLOS Genetics
- Figure 5

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(data.table)
library(viridis)
library(tidyr)
library(xtable)
library(cowplot)

"%&%" = function(a,b) paste(a,b,sep="")
```

```{r,fig.width=10,fig.height=3}
pi1 <- fread('/home/lauren/files_for_revisions_plosgen/metaxcan_asthma/Figure_5_values_table.txt')
pi1 <- mutate(pi1, disc=factor(disc,levels=c('AFA','CAU','HIS','AFHI','ALL')))

fig <- ggplot(pi1, aes(x=threshold,y=pi1,col=rep)) + geom_line() + geom_point() + facet_wrap(~disc,nrow=1) +
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE) + theme_bw(12) + labs(x=expression(paste(R^2, ' threshold')),y=expression(pi[1]),col="Replication\nPopulation") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))
print(fig)
```


```{r}
tiff("Fig5.tiff", width = 19, height = 5.7, units = 'cm', res = 300, compression = 'lzw')
fig
dev.off()
```
